body:
This honestly would have been golden had it no been for that retarded censorship thing applied on the genitals of the girls and guys in hentai all the time. Honestly bro, what the fuck is up with censorship in Japanese porn, LITERALLY PORN. 
It don't make a lick of sense to me, and don't even get me started on how much jav and other Japanese porn was ruined by censorship. Whatever Japan, do what you want. Oh by the way, have fun burying that Shinzo Abe retard. 😂😂😂😂😂😂😂😂😂😂😂😂😂😂
